com.jr.data

Class CommentContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jr.data.CommentContainer

  • public class CommentContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to contain basic comment data as loaded or saved to database
    Author:
    Julian Ragan

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommentContainer

        public CommentContainer()

      • CommentContainer

        public CommentContainer(java.lang.String plainTextContent,
                        java.lang.String author,
                        java.lang.String htmlContent,
                        java.lang.String lastEditAuthor,
                        java.util.Date timestamp,
                        java.util.Date lastEditTimestamp,
                        int commentId,
                        int referencedId,
                        int authorId,
                        int lastEditAuthorId,
                        int refStart,
                        int refStop,
                        boolean editPermission,
                        boolean deletePermission)
        Parameters:
        plainTextContent - plain text content of the comment
        author - author's full name
        htmlContent - html content for formatting
        lastEditAuthor - full name of the last person to edit the comment, may be null
        timestamp - comment's posting time
        lastEditTimestamp - comment's last edit date, may be null
        commentId - id of the comment
        referencedId - id of cited comment
        authorId - id of the author
        lastEditAuthorId - id of the last edit author
        refStart - start of citation in referenced comment
        refStop - end of citation in referenced comment
        editPermission - decides whether current user has permission to edit this comment
        deletePermission - decides wheter current user has deletion permission fo this comment
